content.query:
datatable (Count:long, status:string, status_count:long) [0,"Low",1, 0,"Medium",2, 0,"High",3, 0,"Critical",4]
|union
(
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor=="Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID=="hsc"
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by src
| extend status = case(FlexNumber1>=50 and FlexNumber2<50, "High",
                        FlexNumber1>=50 and FlexNumber2>=50, "Critical",
                        FlexNumber1<50 and FlexNumber2>=50, "Medium",
                        FlexNumber1>0 and FlexNumber1<50 and FlexNumber2>0 and FlexNumber2<50,"Low",
                        "True"
                         )
| where status != "True"
| extend status_count = case(status=="Critical", 4, status=="High", 3, status=="Medium", 2, 1)
| summarize Count = count() by status, status_count
)
| summarize Count=sum(Count) by status, status_count
| sort by status_count asc
content.title: Hosts Count By Severity

content.json: ðŸ’¡ _Click on the above tile to view more details_

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor=="Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID=="hsc"
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by src
| extend status = case(FlexNumber1>=50 and FlexNumber2<50, "High",
                        FlexNumber1>=50 and FlexNumber2>=50, "Critical",
                        FlexNumber1<50 and FlexNumber2>=50, "Medium",
                        FlexNumber1>0 and FlexNumber1<50 and FlexNumber2>0 and FlexNumber2<50,"Low",
                        "True"
                         )
| where status != "True" and '{status}'==status
| sort by FlexNumber1 desc, FlexNumber2 desc
| project row_number() , status ,src,SourceIP ,DeviceCustomString1 , DeviceCustomString2 , FlexNumber1 , FlexNumber2 , DeviceCustomString4 , TimeGenerated 
| project-rename Sr_No = Column1, Severity=status , Hostname=src, IP_Address=SourceIP , Src_Key_Asset=DeviceCustomString1 , Dest_Key_Asset=DeviceCustomString2 , Threat=FlexNumber1 , Certainty=FlexNumber2 , Host_Details=DeviceCustomString4, Latest_Update = TimeGenerated
content.title: Hosts With {status} Severity

content.json: ðŸ’¡ _Click on a row in the above grid to view more details_

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
    and DeviceEventClassID !in ("health", "audit", "campaigns", "hsc", "asc")
| extend ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID))
| where isnotempty(ExternalID)
| search kind=case_sensitive '{hostname}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ExternalID
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "cat=" Category ";"*
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP), dst = coalesce(DestinationHostName, DestinationIP), Category = coalesce(column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),Category,"")
| sort by TimeGenerated desc, FlexNumber1 desc, FlexNumber2 desc
| project row_number(), TimeGenerated, DeviceCustomString5, Category, DeviceEventClassID, src, SourceIP, dst, DestinationIP, FlexNumber1, FlexNumber2, DeviceCustomString4
| project-rename Sr_No = Column1, Detection_Time = TimeGenerated, Triaged = DeviceCustomString5, Type = DeviceEventClassID , Source = src , Source_IP = SourceIP ,Destination = dst , Destination_IP = DestinationIP  , Threat = FlexNumber1 , Certainty = FlexNumber2, Detection_Details = DeviceCustomString4
| take 10
content.title: Latest 10 Detections For Host: {hostname}
content.noDataMessage: No detections found for the selected host in the specified time duration.

items.name: Overview - Top 10 Detections For selected Host

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor=="Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID == "hsc"
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by src 
| sort by FlexNumber1 desc, FlexNumber2 desc
| limit 10
| project row_number(), src, SourceIP, FlexNumber1 , FlexNumber2, TimeGenerated
| project-rename Sr_No = Column1, Source=src, Source_IP=SourceIP, Threat=FlexNumber1, Certainty=FlexNumber2, Latest_Detection = TimeGenerated
content.title: Worst Offenders

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor=="Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID == "hsc" and (DeviceCustomString1 == "True" or DeviceCustomString2 == "True")
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by src 
| sort by FlexNumber1 desc, FlexNumber2 desc
| limit 10
| project row_number(), src, SourceIP, DeviceCustomString1 , DeviceCustomString2, FlexNumber1 , FlexNumber2, TimeGenerated
| project-rename Sr_No = Column1, Source=src, Source_IP=SourceIP,Src_Key_Asset=DeviceCustomString1,Des_Key_Asset=DeviceCustomString2, Threat=FlexNumber1, Certainty=FlexNumber2, Latest_Detection = TimeGenerated

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor=="Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID !in ("health", "audit", "campaigns", "hsc", "asc")
| extend ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID),"")
| where isnotempty(ExternalID)
| summarize Count=count() by DeviceEventClassID 
| top 10 by Count desc

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
    and DeviceEventClassID !in ("health", "audit", "campaigns", "hsc", "asc")
| extend ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID),"")
| where isnotempty(ExternalID)
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "cat=" Category ";"*
| where DeviceEventClassID == '{type_token}'
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP), dst = coalesce(DestinationHostName, DestinationIP), Category = coalesce(column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),Category,"")
| sort by TimeGenerated desc, FlexNumber1 desc, FlexNumber2 desc
| project row_number(), DeviceCustomString5, Category, src, SourceIP, dst, DestinationIP, FlexNumber1, FlexNumber2, DeviceCustomString4, TimeGenerated
| project-rename Sr_No = Column1, Triaged = DeviceCustomString5, Source = src , Source_IP = SourceIP ,Destination = dst , Destination_IP = DestinationIP  , Threat = FlexNumber1 , Certainty = FlexNumber2, Detection_Details = DeviceCustomString4, Latest_Detection = TimeGenerated

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor=="Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID !in ("health", "audit", "campaigns", "hsc", "asc")
| extend ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID),"")
| where isnotempty(ExternalID)
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "cat=" cat ";"*
| extend cat = coalesce(
                column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),

                ""

| summarize Count = count() by cat
| top 10 by Count desc

parameters.name: severity_token
parameters.label: Severity
parameters.query:
datatable (status:string) ["All"]
|union
(
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID == "hsc" and DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by src
| extend status = case(FlexNumber1>=50 and FlexNumber2<50, "High",
                       FlexNumber1>=50 and FlexNumber2>=50, "Critical",
                       FlexNumber1<50 and FlexNumber2>=50, "Medium",
                       FlexNumber1>0 and FlexNumber1<50 and FlexNumber2>0 and FlexNumber2<50,"Low",
                       "pass"
                         )
| where status != "pass"
| distinct status
)

content.query:
let token = "{severity_token}";
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID == "hsc" and DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by src
| extend status = case(FlexNumber1>=50 and FlexNumber2<50, "High",
                      FlexNumber1>=50 and FlexNumber2>=50, "Critical",
                      FlexNumber1<50 and FlexNumber2>=50, "Medium",
                      FlexNumber1>0 and FlexNumber1<50 and FlexNumber2>0 and FlexNumber2<50,"Low",
                      "pass"
                        )
| where status != "pass"
| where case(token == "All", status!="All", status==token)
| sort by FlexNumber1 desc, FlexNumber2 desc,TimeGenerated desc
| project row_number(), status , SourceHostName , SourceIP , DeviceCustomString1 , DeviceCustomString2 , FlexNumber1 , FlexNumber2 , DeviceCustomString4 , TimeGenerated
| project-rename Sr_No = Column1, Severity = status ,Hostname= SourceHostName , Source_IP = SourceIP , Src_Key_Asset = DeviceCustomString1 ,Dest_Key_Asset = DeviceCustomString2 , Threat = FlexNumber1 , Certainty = FlexNumber2 , Host_Details = DeviceCustomString4, Latest_Update = TimeGenerated

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID == "hsc" and DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP)
| where src=='{hostname}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, FlexNumber1, FlexNumber2) by TimeGenerated=bin(TimeGenerated,10m)
| project-rename Threat=FlexNumber1, Certainty=FlexNumber2
content.title: Threat And Certainty Over Time For Host: {hostname}

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
    and DeviceEventClassID !in ("health", "audit", "campaigns", "hsc", "asc")
    and (isnotnull(ExternalID) or isnotnull(ExtID))
| parse-where AdditionalExtensions with * "cat=" Category ";"*
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP), dst = coalesce(DestinationHostName, DestinationIP), Category = coalesce(Category, DeviceEventCategory), ExternalID = coalesce(ExternalID,ExtID)
| search kind=case_sensitive '{hostname}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ExternalID
| sort by FlexNumber1 desc, FlexNumber2 desc
| project row_number(), TimeGenerated, DeviceCustomString5, Category, DeviceEventClassID, src, SourceIP, dst, DestinationIP, FlexNumber1, FlexNumber2, DeviceCustomString4
| project-rename Sr_No = Column1, Detection_Time = TimeGenerated, Triaged = DeviceCustomString5, Type = DeviceEventClassID , Source = src , Source_IP = SourceIP ,Destination = dst , Destination_IP = DestinationIP  , Threat = FlexNumber1 , Certainty = FlexNumber2, Detection_Details = DeviceCustomString4

parameters.name: severity_token
parameters.label: Severity
parameters.query:
datatable (status:string) ["All"]
|union
(
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID == "asc" and isnotnull(FlexNumber1) and isnotnull(FlexNumber2)
| extend ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID),"")
| where isnotempty(ExternalID)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ExternalID
| extend status = case(FlexNumber1>=50 and FlexNumber2<50, "High",
                       FlexNumber1>=50 and FlexNumber2>=50, "Critical",
                       FlexNumber1<50 and FlexNumber2>=50, "Medium",
                       FlexNumber1>0 and FlexNumber1<50 and FlexNumber2>0 and FlexNumber2<50,"Low",
                       "pass"
                         )
| where status != "pass"
| distinct status
)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor=="Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID=="asc" and isnotnull(FlexNumber1) and isnotnull(FlexNumber2)
| extend ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID),"")
| where isnotempty(ExternalID)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ExternalID
| extend status = case(FlexNumber1>=50 and FlexNumber2<50, "High",FlexNumber1>=50 and FlexNumber2>=50, "Critical",FlexNumber1<50 and FlexNumber2>=50, "Medium",FlexNumber1>0 and FlexNumber1<50 and FlexNumber2>0 and FlexNumber2<50,"Low","True")
| extend saccount = extract("saccount=(.+?);", 1, AdditionalExtensions)
 | where status != "True"
| where case("{severity_token}" == "All", status!="All", status=="{severity_token}")
| sort by FlexNumber1 desc, FlexNumber2 desc
| project row_number(), status, saccount, FlexNumber1, FlexNumber2, DeviceCustomString4, TimeGenerated
| project-rename Sr_No = Column1, Severity=status, Account_Name=saccount, Threat=FlexNumber1, Certainty=FlexNumber2, Account_Details=DeviceCustomString4, Latest_Update = TimeGenerated

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID !in ("health", "audit", "campaigns", "hsc", "asc")
| extend ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID),"")
| where isnotempty(ExternalID)
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "cat=" Category ";"*
| parse-where AdditionalExtensions with * "account=" account ";"*
| extend Category = coalesce(
                        column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),
                        Category,
                        ""
                    )
| where account == '{account_name}'
| summarize count() by Category, TimeGenerated

parameters.name: category_token
parameters.label: Detection Categories
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
| where DeviceEventClassID !in~ ("health", "audit", "campaigns", "hsc", "asc")
| extend ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID),"")
| where isnotempty(ExternalID)
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "cat=" Category ";"*
| extend Category = coalesce(column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),Category,"")
| distinct Category

parameters.name: type_token
parameters.label: Type
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
| where DeviceEventClassID !in~ ("health", "audit", "campaigns", "hsc", "asc")
| extend ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID),"")
| where isnotempty(ExternalID)
| parse-where AdditionalExtensions with * "cat=" Category ";"*
| extend Category = coalesce(column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),Category,"")
| where Category in ({category_token})
| distinct DeviceEventClassID

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
    and DeviceEventClassID !in ("health", "audit", "campaigns", "hsc", "asc")
| extend ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID),"")
| where isnotempty(ExternalID)
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "cat=" Category ";"*
| extend Category = coalesce(
                        column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),
                        Category,
                        ""
                    )
| where Category in ({category_token}) 
    and DeviceEventClassID in ({type_token})
| summarize count() by Category, TimeGenerated
content.title: Detection Categories Over Time

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
    and DeviceEventClassID !in ("health", "audit", "campaigns", "hsc", "asc")
| extend ExternalID = coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID),"")
| where isnotempty(ExternalID)
| parse-where AdditionalExtensions with * "cat=" Category ";"*
| extend Category = coalesce(
                        column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),
                        Category,
                        ""
                    )
| where Category in ({category_token}) 
    and DeviceEventClassID in ({type_token})
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP), dst = coalesce(DestinationHostName, DestinationIP)
| sort by TimeGenerated desc, FlexNumber1 desc, FlexNumber2 desc
| project row_number(), TimeGenerated, ExternalID, DeviceCustomString5, Category, DeviceEventClassID, src, SourceIP, dst, DestinationIP, FlexNumber1, FlexNumber2, DeviceCustomString4
| project-rename Sr_No = Column1,Detection_Time = TimeGenerated, External_ID = ExternalID, Triaged = DeviceCustomString5, Type = DeviceEventClassID , Source = src , Source_IP = SourceIP ,Destination = dst , Destination_IP = DestinationIP  , Threat = FlexNumber1 , Certainty = FlexNumber2, Detection_Details = DeviceCustomString4

parameters.name: campaign_token
parameters.label: Campaign ID
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID == "campaigns"
| distinct Activity

parameters.name: type_token
parameters.label: Type
parameters.query:
datatable (reason:string) ["All"]
| union
(
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID == "campaigns"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "reason="reason
| extend reason = coalesce(column_ifexists("Reason", ""),reason,"")
| where Activity in ({campaign_token})
| distinct reason
)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID == "campaigns"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "reason="reason
| extend reason = coalesce(
                        column_ifexists("Reason", ""),
                        reason,
                        ""
                    )
| where Activity in ({campaign_token})
| where case("{type_token}" == "All", reason != "All", reason == "{type_token}")
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP) , dest = coalesce(DestinationHostName, DestinationIP)
| summarize Count = count() by Activity
| top 10 by Count desc
content.title: Top 10 Campaigns

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID == "campaigns"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "reason="reason
| extend reason = coalesce(
                        column_ifexists("Reason", ""),
                        reason,
                        ""
                    )
| where Activity in ({campaign_token})
| where case("{type_token}" == "All", reason != "All", reason == "{type_token}")
| extend src = coalesce(SourceHostName, SourceIP) , dest = coalesce(DestinationHostName, DestinationIP)
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project row_number(), TimeGenerated , Activity , DeviceCustomString4 , DeviceAction , src , SourceIP , dest , DestinationIP , reason, DeviceCustomString6
| project-rename Sr_No = Column1, Time_Generated = TimeGenerated, Campaign_ID = Activity, Campaign_URL = DeviceCustomString4, Action = DeviceAction, Hostname = src, Source_IP = SourceIP, Destination = dest, Destination_IP = DestinationIP, Type = reason, Detection_ID = DeviceCustomString6

parameters.name: result_token
parameters.label: Result
parameters.query:
datatable (Result:string) ["All"]
| union
(
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "health"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "outcome="Result
| extend Result = coalesce(column_ifexists("EventOutcome", ""),Result,"")
| summarize by Result
)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "health"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "outcome="outcome
| extend outcome = coalesce(column_ifexists("EventOutcome", ""),outcome,"")
| where case("{result_token:value}" == "All", outcome != "All", outcome=="{result_token:value}")
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project row_number(), TimeGenerated ,outcome,Message
| project-rename Sr_No = Column1,Time_Generated = TimeGenerated, Activity = Message,Result = outcome

parameters.name: user_token
parameters.label: User
parameters.query:
datatable (SourceUserName:string) ["All"]
| union
(
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID == "audit"
| extend SourceUserName = coalesce(SourceUserName, "Unknown")
| distinct SourceUserName
)

parameters.name: result_token
parameters.label: Result
parameters.query:
datatable (Result:string) ["All"]
| union
(
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks" and DeviceEventClassID == "audit"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "outcome="Result
| extend Result = coalesce(column_ifexists("EventOutcome", ""),Result,"")
| where case("{user_token}" == "All", SourceUserName != "All", "{user_token}" == "Unknown", SourceUserName == "", SourceUserName == "{user_token}")
| distinct Result
)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID == "audit" and DeviceVendor == "Vectra Networks"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "outcome="outcome
| extend outcome = coalesce(column_ifexists("EventOutcome", ""),outcome,"")
| where case("{user_token}" == "All", SourceUserName != "All", "{user_token}" == "Unknown", SourceUserName == "", SourceUserName == "{user_token}") 
    and case("{result_token}" == "All", outcome != "All", outcome == "{result_token}")
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project row_number(), TimeGenerated,SourceUserName,SourceUserPrivileges,Message,outcome
| project-rename Sr_No= Column1,Time_Generated = TimeGenerated, User=SourceUserName, Role=SourceUserPrivileges, Activity=Message, Result=outcome
